languages.text: The Overseer selects an unoccupied cell in their line of sight. The cyber-eagle moves to that cell and deals its weapon damage to all adjacent enemies without provoking attacks of opportunity. Those enemies must pass an Agility resistance test with a −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} penalty or become blinded for 1 round. Then, the cyber-eagle begins {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}. While the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, this ability is replaced with {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Blinding Strike — Soaring{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
If the Cyber-Eagle is Ascended, it lands in the targeted empty cell the Overseer sees. Upon landing, each enemy around it makes AGI Save (-5 * Pet's PER Bonus). On a failure, they are considered Blinded for 1 round and receive a medium amount of Rending damage.
If the Cyber-Eagle is not Ascended, it ascends and immediately leaves the battlefield, dealing a tiny amount of Rending damage to all enemies around and provoking AGI Save (-5 * Pet's AGI Bonus). On a failure, they are considered Blinded for 1 round. This action doesn’t provoke attacks of opportunity.

languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects an unoccupied cell in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-eagle moves to that cell and deals its weapon damage to all adjacent enemies without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Those enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Then, the cyber-eagle begins {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}. While the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is replaced with {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Blinding Strike — Soaring{/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Надзиратель{/g} выбирает свободную клетку в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g}. Киберорел перемещается туда и наносит урон от оружия всем врагам на соседних клетках, не провоцируя {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}. Эти враги совершают проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослеплены{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. После этого киберорел поднимается {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздух{/g}. Пока киберорел {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздухе{/g}, эта {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} заменяется на {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Ослепляющую атаку — с высоты{/g}.

Those enemies must pass an Agility resistance test with a −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} penalty or become blinded for 1 round. Then, the cyber-eagle begins {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}. While the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, this ability is replaced with {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Blinding Strike — Soaring{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Надзиратель выбирает свободную клетку в зоне видимости. Киберорел перемещается туда и наносит урон от оружия всем врагам на соседних клетках, не провоцируя атаки по возможности. Эти враги совершают проверку Ловкости на сопротивление со штрафом −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} и в случае провала оказываются ослеплены на 1 раунд. После этого киберорел поднимается {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздух{/g}. Пока киберорел {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздухе{/g}, эта способность заменяется на {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Ослепляющую атаку — с высоты{/g}.

Надзиратель выбирает свободную клетку в зоне видимости. Киберорел перемещается туда и наносит урон от оружия всем врагам на соседних клетках, не провоцируя атаки по возможности. Эти враги совершают проверку Ловкости на сопротивление со штрафом −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} и в случае провала оказываются ослеплены на 1 раунд. После этого киберорел поднимается {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздух{/g}. Пока киберорел {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздухе{/g}, эта способность заменяется на {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Ослепляющую атаку — с высоты{/g}.

languages.text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} wählt ein freies Feld in seiner {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} aus. Der Cyber-Adler bewegt sich zu diesem Feld und fügt allen Gegnern auf angrenzenden Feldern seinen Waffenschaden zu, ohne {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} zu provozieren. Diese Gegner müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} mit einem Abzug von -{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} bestehen, um nicht 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}geblendet{/g} zu werden. Anschließend beginnt der Cyber-Adler zu {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreisen{/g}. Während der Cyber-Adler {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreist{/g}, wird diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} durch {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Blendender Hieb – Kreisen{/g} ersetzt.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects an unoccupied cell in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-eagle moves to that cell and deals its weapon damage to all adjacent enemies without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Those enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Then, the cyber-eagle begins {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}. While the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is replaced with {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Blinding Strike — Soaring{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Aufseher wählt ein freies Feld in seiner Sichtlinie aus. Der Cyber-Adler bewegt sich zu diesem Feld und fügt allen Gegnern auf angrenzenden Feldern seinen Waffenschaden zu, ohne Gelegenheitsangriffe zu provozieren. Diese Gegner müssen eine Widerstandsprobe auf Beweglichkeit mit einem Abzug von -{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} bestehen, um nicht 1 Runde lang geblendet zu werden. Anschließend beginnt der Cyber-Adler zu {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreisen{/g}. Während der Cyber-Adler {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreist{/g}, wird diese Fähigkeit durch {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Blendender Hieb – Kreisen{/g} ersetzt.

Der Aufseher wählt ein freies Feld in seiner Sichtlinie aus. Der Cyber-Adler bewegt sich zu diesem Feld und fügt allen Gegnern auf angrenzenden Feldern seinen Waffenschaden zu, ohne Gelegenheitsangriffe zu provozieren. Diese Gegner müssen eine Widerstandsprobe auf Beweglichkeit mit einem Abzug von -{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} bestehen, um nicht 1 Runde lang geblendet zu werden. Der Aufseher wählt ein freies Feld in seiner Sichtlinie aus. Der Cyber-Adler bewegt sich zu diesem Feld und fügt allen Gegnern auf angrenzenden Feldern seinen Waffenschaden zu, ohne Gelegenheitsangriffe zu provozieren. Diese Gegner müssen eine Widerstandsprobe auf Beweglichkeit mit einem Abzug von -{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} bestehen, um nicht 1 Runde lang geblendet zu werden. Anschließend beginnt der Cyber-Adler zu {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreisen{/g}. Während der Cyber-Adler {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreist{/g}, wird diese Fähigkeit durch {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Blendender Hieb – Kreisen{/g} ersetzt.

languages.text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} sélectionne une case inoccupée dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g}. Le cyber-aigle se place sur cette case et inflige les dégâts de son arme à tous les ennemis adjacents, sans provoquer d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}. Les cibles doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec une pénalité de −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19}, sans quoi elles sont {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}aveuglées{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Le cyber-aigle prend ensuite son {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}envol{/g}. Quand le cyber-aigle est en {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}vol{/g}, cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} est remplacée par {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Frappe aveuglante — Vol{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects an unoccupied cell in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-eagle moves to that cell and deals its weapon damage to all adjacent enemies without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Those enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Then, the cyber-eagle begins {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}. While the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is replaced with {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Blinding Strike — Soaring{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le surveillant sélectionne une case inoccupée dans sa ligne de mire. Le cyber-aigle se place sur cette case et inflige les dégâts de son arme à tous les ennemis adjacents, sans provoquer d'attaques d'opportunité. Les cibles doivent réussir un test de résistance d'Agilité avec une pénalité de −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19}, sans quoi elles sont aveuglées pendant 1 round. Le cyber-aigle prend ensuite son {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}envol{/g}. Quand le cyber-aigle est en {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}vol{/g}, cette capacité est remplacée par {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Frappe aveuglante — Vol{/g}.

Le surveillant sélectionne une case inoccupée dans sa ligne de mire. Le cyber-aigle se place sur cette case et inflige les dégâts de son arme à tous les ennemis adjacents, sans provoquer d'attaques d'opportunité. Les cibles doivent réussir un test de résistance d'Agilité avec une pénalité de −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19}, sans quoi elles sont aveuglées pendant 1 round. Le cyber-aigle prend ensuite son {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}envol{/g}. Quand le cyber-aigle est en {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}vol{/g}, cette capacité est remplacée par {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Frappe aveuglante — Vol{/g}.

Le surveillant sélectionne une case inoccupée dans sa ligne de mire. Le cyber-aigle se place sur cette case et inflige les dégâts de son arme à tous les ennemis adjacents, sans provoquer d'attaques d'opportunité. Les cibles doivent réussir un test de résistance d'Agilité avec une pénalité de −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19}, sans quoi elles sont aveuglées pendant 1 round. Le cyber-aigle prend ensuite son {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}envol{/g}. Quand le cyber-aigle est en {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}vol{/g}, cette capacité est remplacée par {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Frappe aveuglante — Vol{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}选择{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内一个未被占据的格子，生化猎鹰会移动至目标格子，对所有邻近敌人造成武器伤害。生化猎鹰的移动不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。所有受到攻击的敌人都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19}减值，若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。随后，生化猎鹰进入{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态。 当生化猎鹰处于{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态时，此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}变为{g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}致盲打击——腾空{/g}。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects an unoccupied cell in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-eagle moves to that cell and deals its weapon damage to all adjacent enemies without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Those enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Then, the cyber-eagle begins {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}. While the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is replaced with {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Blinding Strike — Soaring{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 监察官选择视线范围内一个未被占据的格子，生化猎鹰会移动至目标格子，对所有邻近敌人造成武器伤害。生化猎鹰的移动不会触发借机攻击。所有受到攻击的敌人都需要进行敏捷抗性检定，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19}减值，若未能通过检定，则会陷入致盲状态，持续一轮。随后，生化猎鹰进入{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态。 当生化猎鹰处于{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态时，此能力变为{g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}致盲打击——腾空{/g}。

监察官选择视线范围内一个未被占据的格子，生化猎鹰会移动至目标格子，对所有邻近敌人造成武器伤害。生化猎鹰的移动不会触发借机攻击。所有受到攻击的敌人都需要进行敏捷抗性检定，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19}减值，若未能通过检定，则会陷入致盲状态，持续一轮。随后，生化猎鹰进入{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态。 当生化猎鹰处于{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态时，此能力变为{g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}致盲打击——腾空{/g}。

languages.text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} selecciona una casilla libre en su {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g}. La ciberáguila se mueve a esa casilla e inflige el doble de su daño de arma a todos los enemigos adyacentes sin provocar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}. Los enemigos deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una penalización de −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegados{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Después, la ciberáguila {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}se eleva{/g}. Mientras la ciberáguila está {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}elevada{/g}, esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} se sustituye por {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Golpe cegador: elevado{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects an unoccupied cell in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-eagle moves to that cell and deals its weapon damage to all adjacent enemies without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Those enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Then, the cyber-eagle begins {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}. While the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is replaced with {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Blinding Strike — Soaring{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El supervisor selecciona una casilla libre en su línea de visión. La ciberáguila se mueve a esa casilla e inflige el doble de su daño de arma a todos los enemigos adyacentes sin provocar ataques de oportunidad. Los enemigos deben superar una prueba de fortaleza de Agilidad con una penalización de −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} o quedar cegados durante 1 asalto. Después, la ciberáguila {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}se eleva{/g}. Mientras la ciberáguila está {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}elevada{/g}, esta capacidad se sustituye por {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Golpe cegador: elevado{/g}.

El supervisor selecciona una casilla libre en su línea de visión. La ciberáguila se mueve a esa casilla e inflige el doble de su daño de arma a todos los enemigos adyacentes sin provocar ataques de oportunidad. Los enemigos deben superar una prueba de fortaleza de Agilidad con una penalización de −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} o quedar cegados durante 1 asalto. Después, la ciberáguila {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}se eleva{/g}. Mientras la ciberáguila está {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}elevada{/g}, esta capacidad se sustituye por {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Golpe cegador: elevado{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}は、{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視線{/g}の中の空いているセルを選択する。サイバーイーグルがそのセルに移動すると、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を引き起こすことなく、隣接するすべての敵に武器ダメージを与える。これらの敵は−{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19}のペナルティで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならず、失敗すると1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}になる。その後、サイバーイーグルは{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}を開始する。 サイバーイーグルが{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}状態のとき、この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は{g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}目くらまし攻撃―舞い上がり{/g}に切り替わる。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects an unoccupied cell in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-eagle moves to that cell and deals its weapon damage to all adjacent enemies without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Those enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Then, the cyber-eagle begins {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}. While the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is replaced with {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Blinding Strike — Soaring{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 監督官は、視線の中の空いているセルを選択する。サイバーイーグルがそのセルに移動すると、機会攻撃を引き起こすことなく、隣接するすべての敵に武器ダメージを与える。これらの敵は−{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19}のペナルティで敏捷性抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると1ラウンドの間盲目になる。その後、サイバーイーグルは{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}を開始する。 サイバーイーグルが{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}状態のとき、このアビリティは{g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}目くらまし攻撃―舞い上がり{/g}に切り替わる。

監督官は、視線の中の空いているセルを選択する。サイバーイーグルがそのセルに移動すると、機会攻撃を引き起こすことなく、隣接するすべての敵に武器ダメージを与える。これらの敵は−{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19}のペナルティで敏捷性抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると1ラウンドの間盲目になる。その後、サイバーイーグルは{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}を開始する。 サイバーイーグルが{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}状態のとき、このアビリティは{g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}目くらまし攻撃―舞い上がり{/g}に切り替わる。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}görüş hattı{/g} içinde boş bir hücre seçer. Siber kartal, o hücreye doğru ilerler ve bitişikteki tüm düşmanlara kullandığı silahın hasarını verir. Bu esnada {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez. Bu düşmanlar −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}körleşirler{/g}. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. Ardından da siber kartal {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselmeye{/g} başlar. Siber kartal {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükseldiğinde{/g} bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetin{/g} yerini {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Kör Eden Atak — Yükselme{/g} alır.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects an unoccupied cell in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-eagle moves to that cell and deals its weapon damage to all adjacent enemies without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Those enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Then, the cyber-eagle begins {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}. While the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is replaced with {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Blinding Strike — Soaring{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Gözetmen, görüş hattı içinde boş bir hücre seçer. Siber kartal, o hücreye doğru ilerler ve bitişikteki tüm düşmanlara kullandığı silahın hasarını verir. Bu esnada fırsat saldırılarını tetiklemez. Bu düşmanlar −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} ceza puanına sahip bir Çeviklik direnç testinden geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde körleşirler. Etkisi 1 raunt sürer. Ardından da siber kartal {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselmeye{/g} başlar. Siber kartal {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükseldiğinde{/g} bu kabiliyetin yerini {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Kör Eden Atak — Yükselme{/g} alır.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, görüş hattı içinde boş bir hücre seçer. Siber kartal, o hücreye doğru ilerler ve bitişikteki tüm düşmanlara kullandığı silahın hasarını verir. Bu esnada fırsat saldırılarını tetiklemez. Bu düşmanlar −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} direnç testinden geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde körleşirler. Etkisi 1 raunt sürer. Ardından da siber kartal {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselmeye{/g} başlar. Siber kartal {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükseldiğinde{/g} bu kabiliyetin yerini {g|f:d830b9fd0e7240139d3f7381fa308ab7}Kör Eden Atak — Yükselme{/g} alır.
